Technique: PAINTED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; GLAZED
Name: Shabti of Wehemmesut (?)
Description: Brightly glazed polychrome faience shabti, with a white background, red face, purple-brown details and hieroglyphic inscription, giving the shabti formula. Polychrome faience figures such as this shabti represent a technical achievement of the late 18th and 19th Dynasties.
